about_the_game:
Defend your System from the corrupted Master and his minions!

The Master and his evil minions have invaded the system and will not stop until every piece of data is corrupted. It’s up to you to save it before time runs out and the system crashes! It won’t be easy. You’ll have to protect the Central Processing Unit from hordes of attacking minions and ultimately from the Master himself. Face it alone, or with a friend!

Data Man is a new game for the original NES 8-bit console that brings arcade action to a home console.


  • 1 or 2 players
  • 20 action packed levels
  • 4 boss encounters
  • Cooperate with a friend or compete for score
  • Local or online co-op via NETPLAY
  • NES ROM 128kb International (PAL and NTSC auto selected) included in installation folder
  • NES ROM 40kb PAL included in installation folder
  • NES ROM 40kb NTSC included in installation folder
  • Optimized for both PAL and NTSC systems

Defend your System from the corrupted Master and his minions!

The Master and his evil minions have invaded the system and will not stop until every piece of data is corrupted. It’s up to you to save it before time runs out and the system crashes! It won’t be easy. You’ll have to protect the Central Processing Unit from hordes of attacking minions and ultimately from the Master himself. Face it alone, or with a friend!

Data Man is a new game for the original NES 8-bit console that brings arcade action to a home console.


  • 1 or 2 players
  • 20 action packed levels
  • 4 boss encounters
  • Cooperate with a friend or compete for score
  • Local or online co-op via NETPLAY
  • NES ROM 128kb International (PAL and NTSC auto selected) included in installation folder
  • NES ROM 40kb PAL included in installation folder
  • NES ROM 40kb NTSC included in installation folder
  • Optimized for both PAL and NTSC systems

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 11
  • Processor: Apple Silicon or Intel
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Storage: 25 MB available space

name: Data Man

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 1GHz
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Storage: 25 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Data Man is a new game for the original 8-bit NES console that brings arcade action to a home console.
